meanings.definition: Below the level of college education.
meanings.sent1: The subcollegiate students were eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: She taught subcollegiate math to high school students.
meanings.sent3: The subcollegiate spelling bee was a fun event for the kids.
meanings.sent4: His subcollegiate knowledge of history amazed his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The subcollegiate curriculum focused on basic skills.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to education below the college level.
meanings.sent1: The subcollegiate program offered classes for young learners.
meanings.sent2: Her subcollegiate background prepared her well for university.
meanings.sent3: The subcollegiate field trip was a hit with the elementary students.
meanings.sent4: His subcollegiate approach to teaching was effective with middle schoolers.
meanings.sent5: The subcollegiate textbooks were designed for early learners.
